new_posts.title: Auto model selection is generally available in GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code
new_posts.summary:
GitHub Copilot auto model selection is now generally available in Visual Studio Code for all Copilot plans. With auto, Copilot chooses a model on your behalf based on current model…

new_posts.title: The GitHub MCP Server adds support for tool-specific configuration, and more
new_posts.summary: The GitHub MCP Server now comes with support for tool-specific configuration, allowing you to customize the server to your needs and minimize context window usage. Simply use the new X-MCP-Tools
